resources.string: Detailed Payment Requesting
Balance
To send payment, you\'ll need to install and use Google Chrome as your default browser.
Ready to send Detailed Payment Request, track your customers and manage your payments on the go\?
Send Detailed Payment Requests and get paid on the go
With all your customer contacts at your fingertips it’s never been easier to view transactions, send Detailed Payment Requests or contact a customer when you’re on the go.
Manage your payments from anywhere

Create and send Detailed Payment Request anywhere you work so your customers can pay in just a few clicks. Keep track of unpaid Detailed Payment Requests and contact customers when they need a reminder.
Transfer funds to your bank, issue customer refunds and send payment, in just a few clicks.
User Agreement
Confirm your email address to create and send Detailed Payment Requests.
Touch ID and PIN will be disabled
Turning off Remember Me will also unlink your Touch ID and disable your PIN.
